archimate:Principle.name: DP04 - Establish a fit-for-purpose contractual framework
archimate:Principle.documentation:
The objective of this design principle is to offer guidelines and mechanisms for creating a flexible, enforceable, and standardized contractual framework that supports data-sharing transactions and the establishment of data spaces.
Core concepts: tailored legal agreement, scalability
Best practicesof fit for purpose contractual framework include using tools like SITRAâ€™sRulebook for a fair data economy, which offers templates for building data networks, and theData Sharing Canvasfrom theData Sharing Coalition[28] which outlines key considerations for developing contractual templates. These resources help create a contractual framework that promotes fair, efficient, and secure data sharing.
